1.title: Between Life and Death
1.plot: Are NDE(Near-Death Experiences) and OBE(Out of Body Experiences real?

2.title: Past-Life Memories
2.plot: Watch some of the most baffling cases of people remembering their past lives from across the world. Researchers reveal that thousands of such cases offer us an explosive insight that memories, emotions, birthmarks & birth defects and unexplained phobias do pass over from one life to another. After exploring cases involving hypnotically induced past-life memories, focus on the most scientifically significant genre within past-life memories: spontaneous past-life memories among children. Researchers have found all over the world thousands of cases of children who spoke ...

3.title: Who Am I? Exploring Consciousness
3.plot: Are we just a bag of chemicals, born out of some chemical reactions? Are we a result of some freak accident or are we just machines with an expiry date? Several eminent neuroscientists have pointed out the necessity of a non-material explanation for consciousness. The episode explores them all - with revealing conclusion!

4.title: Reincarnation Decoded
4.plot: Reincarnation in World History, culture and Religions - This episode explores the tenability that reincarnation has enjoyed throughout the world history. We trace the roots of this theory in Pre-Greek European, Ancient Greek, Chinese, Australian, American Indian civilizations and major religious traditions of the world including Judaism, Islam, Christianity, Buddhism and Hinduism. Science of the Soul - Further, we explore the most coherent and comprehensive understanding about the soul and its reincarnation. The episode illustrates subtle yet precise line between mind...

imdb.plot outline: Where do we come from? What are we? and Where are we going? These are questions that have engaged the greatest minds throughout history. This four-part documentary series seeks the answers to these questions by exploring exciting findings from the fields of consciousness studies, near-death experiences and past- life memories research.Case studies of people who are conscious even though medically documented to be unconscious or dead reveal that our consciousness is not restricted to our brain. Case studies of people who recollect past lives memories suggest that death may not be the end of life. Adventurous researchers from around the world are following the evidence from these extraordinary cases and its leading them to discover that the lines of evidence converge to a conclusion that is refreshingly new - yet perennially known. Ambitious and rigorous, this definitive series brings together, for the first time, greatest international scientists, scholars and researchers with their inaccessible research and cases to throw new light on this ever expanding and mysterious subject. Join us on a journey that expands our understanding of what it means to be human and reveals new horizons for our human aspirations.
imdb.title: Life, Death and Reincarnation
plot: An epic adventure that aims to unravel the mystery at the heart of our existence: the questions of our identity and our destiny.::Sanjay Sharma
